CON100103: The Approval screen allows managers to review, approve, or reject various employee requests, including leave, overtime, expenses, and task completions.
CON1001013: Spot Activity captures real-time events or actions that occur spontaneously. It helps in tracking immediate issues or tasks requiring urgent attention.
CON1001019: The Time Sheet module allows employees to record daily work hours, assigned tasks, and project contributions, enabling accurate payroll and productivity tracking.
CON1001024: A Manager Approval Screen is used by managers to review, approve, or reject requests made by their team members. This may include leave applications, on-duty requests, shift changes, timesheet approvals, and other HR-related actions.
CON1001027: The Manager Desk allows managers to review, approve, or reject requests from their team members, including leave applications, on-duty requests, shift changes, timesheet approvals, and other HR-related actions.
